ing: 1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, for garnish
des: "This recipe will make a fresh and satisfying snack. You can toss it on iceberg lettuce or use it as a spread for sandwiches."
ins: In a food processor, blend the tuna, red bell pepper, onion, cilantro, capers, relish, mayonnaise, mustard, and garlic powder until smooth. Transfer to a bowl, and mix in the white beans. Garnish with parsley to serve.
